channel.title: Colleen Massoth on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in Colleen Massoth on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: New Text-the-Church Info
item.description: Greetings! I hope you all had an excellent start to the week!

item.title: COVID-19 Update July 27th
item.description: Greetings! I don’t know about all of you, but I sure am learning a lot about myself in these last several months.

item.title: COVID-19 Update June 28
item.description: Greetings, As I write this, we are exactly one week away from our first in person worship service since March.

item.title: Covid-19 Update June 11
item.description: Greetings! As we move into the summer months, we are approaching Stage 5 in Governor Holcombâ€™s plan.

item.title: COVID-19 Update May 14
item.description: There have certainly been many changes for us over the last several weeks.

item.title: COVID-19 Update May 4
item.description: Church Family, Most of you are probably aware of the updates the Governor made last Friday.

item.title: Update from the Clerk
item.description: The CCT met again this week.

item.title: CCT Updates
item.description: The CCT met again last night to discuss the recent stay at home order issued by Governor Holcomb.

item.title: March 18 COVID-19 Update
item.description: The CCT met last night to discuss worship services, building usage, and planned activities in light of the CDC recommendations for social distancing.
